title: The Secret Diary of Alice in Wonderland, Age 42 and Three-Quarters
description: Miami real estate broker and terminal anglophile, Alice Harte, falls for the wrong White Rabbit. Nigel Channing is an international conman with a gift for crafting Byronesque emails. He sweeps Alice off her feet and down a rabbit hole laden with mugs, thugs, and be-headers. Will Alice be able to keep her head when all about her are losing theirs? Are the cards stacked against her or will she find true love? Is there a Joker in the deck?  Books in the Criminally Funny Romantic Suspense series: The Secret Diary of Alice in Wonderland, Age 42 and Three-Quarters Wendy and the Lost Boys Zo White and the Seven Morphs
author: Barbara Silkstone
